title: Climbers
body:
I'm just looking for some people who want to climb to gold with me.        
:)

I reckon that climbing together with some friends is a blast!



Add me!!!

replies.body: Doesn't matter what rank u are. If we have fun and climb, it's all g.
I'm in bronze 1, but i should be in gold, just cant get out. I'm pretty damn good i think but its cool if you dont wanna play with me. Ive sent you a friend request.
